casebody.data:
ADAMS CREEK ASSOCIATES
v.
DAVIS, et al. 3A08-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2018 L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Law Lamar Armstrong, III, Attorneys at Law, Smithfield, for Adams Creek Associates James E. Hairston, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Davis, Melvin, et al. William G. Simpson, Jr., Chapel Hill, C. Frank Goldsmith, Jr., Marion, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of June 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of June 2018."

*112Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 13th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
